reviews.review_msg: At first, she seemed scary, strict, and uncompromising but turned out to be the exact opposite! The course was well structured, the expectations were clear, and she equipped us with everything needed to master all objectives. The lectures were terrific because she explained the material in a simple, straightforward manner.

Super understanding. Always available to help. Covered a lot of materials very fast, but I guess that was because we had three hour classes instead of two hour classes. Final was a joke, half of the questions were from practice problems she posted.

She ended a class with "I can see you are all very confused so we will end this here and I will see you next week". Taught 6 chapters in 2 classes(both were let out early), and then we had a mid term. She laughed at a student for not understanding.
